author: wn.com
title: End of ERA for uranium mining in Kakadu (ACF - Australian Conservation Foundation)
text: ( Source : ACF - Australian Conservation Foundation ) Energy Resources of Australia today informed the ASX that the Mirarr traditional owners have refused to extend ERA 's authority to operate the Ranger uranium mine beyond January 2021. Under
